questions.question_text: Which of the following is the BEST method to prevent wire transfer fraud by bank employees?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
B. "Dual control by system" is also an effective approach, but its effectiveness depends on how it is specifically implemented. Typically, dual control by system refers to a mechanism in which different departments or roles take turns auditing and approving. However, for this to provide sufficient security, it needs to be properly managed and implemented.

Overall, the most recommended method for preventing wire transfer fraud is A. Two-factor authentication control.

Selected Answer: B
System-enforced dual control is the BEST method to prevent wire transfer fraud by bank employees. Dual control involves requiring the involvement of two or more individuals to complete a critical or sensitive task. In the context of wire transfers, system-enforced dual control would mean that two or more authorized individuals are required to approve and execute a wire transfer.
This control helps mitigate the risk of fraud because it ensures that no single individual has the ability to initiate and complete a wire transfer independently. Even if one person's credentials are compromised, an additional layer of approval is needed, adding an extra barrier to fraudulent activities.

questions.question_text: Which of the following would be MOST useful to an organization planning to adopt a public cloud computing model?

discussion.content: I believe A is the answer. Service level agreement (SLA) performance metrics

c. While Service Level Agreement (SLA) performance metrics (Option A) are important for understanding the expected performance and reliability of the cloud services, they do not provide a comprehensive view of the security and control measures in place. An Independent control assessment (Option C) is more useful because it offers an unbiased evaluation of the cloud provider's controls, helping the organization ensure that the provider meets their security and compliance requirements.

Selected Answer: A
While an independent control assessment (option C) could also be valuable for assessing the security and compliance posture of the CSP, SLA performance metrics are more directly relevant to evaluating the quality of service delivery and meeting the organization's operational needs in a public cloud environment.

Selected Answer: C
C. Independent control assessment

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.

Selected Answer: C
When planning to adopt a public cloud computing model, an organization would find an independent control assessment to be MOST useful. This involves a third-party assessment of the cloud service provider's security controls and practices.
While each option has its importance, an independent control assessment (Option C) provides the organization with an objective evaluation of the effectiveness of the cloud service provider's security controls. It offers assurance that the provider's security measures are in place and functioning as intended.
In the context of security and risk management, having an independent assessment of the cloud service provider's controls is critical for making informed decisions about the adoption of a public cloud computing model.

questions.question_text: In order to be useful, a key performance indicator (KPI) MUST:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. be changed frequently to reflect organizational strategy.

Selected Answer: C
In order to be useful, a key performance indicator (KPI) MUST have a target value. A target value provides a benchmark or goal that the organization aims to achieve. It serves as a reference point against which actual performance can be compared. The presence of a target value helps organizations assess their performance, identify areas for improvement, and make informed decisions.
